name: Masscan-for-Metasploit
tagline: Masscan bash Implementation for direct import to metasploit.
body:
This project uses masscan (https://github.com/robertdavidgraham/masscan) to scan an IP block and produce result in XML format which can then be directly imported to Metasploit Framework (https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework) using **db_import**. By default the XML generated by masscan is not compatible with Metasploit # Installation _git clone https://github.com/tiwaryshailesh/Masscan-For-Metasploit.git
_ _cd Masscan-For-Metasploit
_ _bash install.sh
_ # Usage massnmap output-File-Name ipblock commaSeperatedPortRange _example_

_msf>   massnmap HRDept 192.168.27.1/24 80,443,23
_ _msf>   db_import HRDept.xml
_ ### Author about.me/tiwaryshailesh
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
